Uses of Interface
org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.remote.RemoteLock

  • Packages that use RemoteLock 
    Package Description
    org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.client
    Client implementation of the transparent JCR-RMI layer.
    org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.remote
    Remote interfaces of the transparent JCR-RMI layer.
    org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.server
    Server implementation of the transparent JCR-RMI layer.

      Lock LocalAdapterFactory.getLock(Session session, RemoteLock remote)
      Factory method for creating a local adapter for a remote lock.
      Lock ClientAdapterFactory.getLock(Session session, RemoteLock remote)
      Creates and returns a ClientLock instance.
      Constructors in org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.client with parameters of type RemoteLock 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientLock(Session session, RemoteLock remote, LocalAdapterFactory factory)
      Creates a local adapter for the given remote lock.
